Interface DaoAuthors

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DaoAuthorsImpl

    public interface DaoAuthors
    Data Access Object for authors in persistence.

           throws java.sql.SQLException

        author - Author to store in the DB.

        Gets all authors stored in persistence.

      • getAuthorByName

        Author getAuthorByName(java.sql.Connection c,
                       java.lang.String author)
                throws AuthorNotFoundException
        Gets an author by name from persistence.
        Parameters:
        c - DB connection.
        author - Author to search for.
        Returns:
        Author that matches desired author.
        Throws:
        AuthorNotFoundException - when author doesn't match any DB entry.

      • existsAuthor

        boolean existsAuthor(java.sql.Connection c,
                     java.lang.String author)
        Check if an author exists in the database.
        Parameters:
        c - DB Connection.
        author - Author name.
        Returns:
        true if exists, false otherwise.

      • deleteIfNoDocuments

        void deleteIfNoDocuments(java.sql.Connection c,
                         java.lang.String author)
        If there is no documents in the database from the author, it is deleted.
        Parameters:
        author - author name.
